name: Roisin M. Molloy
note:
We are going to discuss options for partnership in managing human resources for Roisin Molloy in Ukraine.

Remote Helpers: rh-s.com



Manager: Anna V.

Result:

Company Name: TRIMEDIKA LIMITED

Company Website: https://trimedika.com/

Contact Person: Roisin M. Molloy

Product: They are committed to improving lives through their innovative medical technology solutions. They can accelerate product commercialisation to create innovative medical tools for hospitals, health systems and healthcare providers so they can deliver the best care possible to patients.

With changing healthcare demands, they are committed to oﬀering devices that will solve problems of costs, ineﬃciencies and ease of use, to deliver better healthcare.

Headquartered in the UK, their team has over 20 years’ experience in the design, manufacture and distribution of medical products into international clinical markets. 

Country-Location: Northern Ireland, UK

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement: Roisin asked for Marketing Managers, Content Managers, but mostly about Lead Generators. 

Next Step: send CVs of the most suitable candidates and all necessary information.

Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email.


Manager: Anna V.

NEW RESULT
We're interviewed candidates for Roisin Molloy company.

Anna https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/anna-o/
English and German philologist, Lead Generator. Have experience with crm system hotspot.
Anastasiia https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/anastasiia-s/
Lead Generator for 5 month. Can speak Slovacian. 
Maria https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/maria-k/
Lead Generator manager, Data Entry. Can make email complaints. English and German (A1) teacher. Writing with German is easier for her. 
Angelina https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/angelina-t/
Graduate Linguistic university. Basic knowledge in Spanish. Lead Generator manager
Alina https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/alina-kh/
Lead Generator Manager. Worked as account manager. 


They need to think about candidates. During the day they give their answer by email.

We are going to discuss further steps for Maria in the TRIMEDIKA LIMITED company. 

Maria https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/maria-k/

They showed what product they are working with. They will send Maria all information which is needed. They prepared  massage templates. Maria needs to set up Microsoft Teams for communicating with Lorah and Roy.

NEW RESULT
We discussed with the client how to solve problems with Linkedin Limitation and accounts.
They are worried about LinkedIn limitations. We say that we also have such problem.  We tell that it is limited to 100 connections per week for all accounts (new and old). 
During the conversation we propose different ways of solution: create 5 accounts or buy our LinkedIn account.
Also tell Roisin and Laura how LinkedIn is worked. 

Next step: they will think about our proposition and come back to us by email.

name: Dina bigger
note:
Hello. Please let me know if you are interested in remote employees from Ukraine? If you have any tasks that could be done remotely, we’ll be glad to take them further. Thank you in advance.
By the way, summer SALE had started!

Best regards, Hanna
JUL 22
Tamar Sela sent the following message at 8:18 AM
View Tamar’s profileTamar Sela
Tamar Sela  8:18 AM
Hi I am looking for graphic designers that can work remotely. If you can send me some link to portfolios of designers that would be great
Hanna Chumakova sent the following messages at 3:00 PM
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  3:00 PM
Thank you for your answer and interest in our company!
Sure. Please have a look SVs of designers on our website  https://www.rh-s.com/design/
Design Archives
rh-s.com • 1 min read
Are you looking for a skilled Remote illustrator, Web designer, Graphic producer, or Motion Designer for a project? Find designers here in a few clicks.
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  3:02 PM
Dear Tamar, let's discuss everything in a brief call. Our manager will advice good candidate for you and answer on all questions. When are you available for a call?
JUL 25
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  7:50 PM
Hello, Tamar.
Are you still interested in designer? Сan we set up a call and discuss details? 
Best regards,
Hanna
JUL 27
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  5:24 PM
Hello, Sorry for disturbing. Tamar, can we have a chat or call? We have summer sale now. We can offer good specialists for a reasonable price. Is it interesting for you?
https://www.rh-s.com/design/
Best regards,
Hanna
Design Archives
rh-s.com • 1 min read
Are you looking for a skilled Remote illustrator, Web designer, Graphic producer, or Motion Designer for a project? Find designers here in a few clicks.
TUESDAY
Tamar Sela sent the following messages at 7:09 AM
View Tamar’s profileTamar Sela
Tamar Sela  7:09 AM
Hello, Hanna
Please set up a zoom with vered@ studioluka.net

Home - luka
studioluka.net • 1 min read
I am very interested but very busy so I am sorry didn’t reply but will update vered
Hanna Chumakova sent the following message at 3:05 PM
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  3:05 PM
Hello, Thank yoy for your answer!
I've written to Vered Roitberg to clarify day and time of meeting to create an invitation.
Thank you for possibility to collaborate with you!
Hava a nice day!
Best regards.
Hanna

Result:

Company Name:  Luka Studio

Company Website:  http://www.studioluka.net/

Contact Person: Vered Roitberg

Specialties: Design Services

Country-Location: Israel

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement: They currently have 15 designers and they are looking for more graphic designers to make illustrations for their clients requests. The week after they would like to have another meeting, for now they want to review the CVs. They will probably give a test task later.
 
Next Step: sending presentation, CVs

Next Contact Date: two weeks after

SM Juliya (Ruzaliya)

name: Alex Tvorkin
note:
Result:
Company Name: Native Offers

Contact Person: Alex Tvorkin

 Specialties:  affiliate network


Country-Location: Israel


Target Audience: worldwide


Immediate Requirement: Alex is looking for Personal/Virtual assistant - who have experience in account management; sales; customer support; communicating with publishers. Full Time. 


Next Step: send all information about our company and CVs of the most suitable candidates. Example of Service Agreement.


Next Contact Date: set up interview on the 29th of October at 10 AM.

client_candidates.comment:
We interviewed candidate for: Native offers company. Ex-client Alex Brot

Candidate: Arpi Simonyan https://rh-s.com/app/managers/lead-generator/arpi-s

Position: Affiliate Network Manager

Responsibilities:
-Coordinating between clients and traffic sources.
-Generating leads through platforms like Facebook, Google, Instagram, and TikTok.
-Handling communication and negotiations via Skype and Telegram.
-Managing CRM to set up campaigns and monitor traffic quality.
-Handling customer support and resolving issues related to traffic quality.
-Participating in professional conferences and presenting the company.

Result:
Arpi Simonyan demonstrated strong communication skills and an understanding of the role. She expressed enthusiasm for learning more and taking on responsibilities. She is fluent in English and Russian, which aligns well with the job requirements. Arpi also showcased a good attitude towards handling less pleasant interactions with patience and professionalism. She confirmed her availability for a full-time position and her willingness to contribute to the company.

Start Date: Pending decision

Next Step: Review Arpi's suitability with the team and schedule a follow-up discussion(30/05) or confirmation of the start date via telegram.

SM Julia

Result:

We interviewed candidate for: Native offers company. Ex-client Alex Brot

Position: Afiiliate Manager

Candidates: 
Yelyzaveta Puzii https://www.rh-s.com/app/managers/lead-generator/yelyzaveta-p
Vitalik Thoruk https://www.rh-s.com/app/managers/lead-generator/vitalii-t

Responsibilities:
-Coordinating between clients and traffic sources.
-Generating leads through platforms like Facebook, Google, Instagram, and TikTok.
-Handling communication and negotiations via Skype and Telegram.
-Managing CRM to set up campaigns and monitor traffic quality.
-Handling customer support and resolving issues related to traffic quality.
-Participating in professional conferences and presenting the company.


Vitalik Thoruk presented himself as a motivated and adaptable candidate, with experience in managing small groups and handling customer relationships. He expressed confidence in his ability to learn and adapt to the role.

Result:

We interviewed candidate for: Native offers company. Ex-client Alex Brot

Position: Afiiliate Manager

Candidates: 
Yelyzaveta Puzii https://www.rh-s.com/app/managers/lead-generator/yelyzaveta-p
Vitalik Thoruk https://www.rh-s.com/app/managers/lead-generator/vitalii-t

Responsibilities:
-Coordinating between clients and traffic sources.
-Generating leads through platforms like Facebook, Google, Instagram, and TikTok.
-Handling communication and negotiations via Skype and Telegram.
-Managing CRM to set up campaigns and monitor traffic quality.
-Handling customer support and resolving issues related to traffic quality.
-Participating in professional conferences and presenting the company.



Result:
Yelyzaveta Puzii has a good understanding of the role but expressed concerns about her analytical skills. She is fluent in English and willing to learn, though she mentioned she might not have the necessary analytical skills required for the role.
